node.excerpt: Eventyr means adventure in Norwegian. And that's exactly the idea behind this: That life is only the memories you make, and the warm relations you create with other people. In an attempt at combining…
I'm an avid runner, and I run on most days of the week - but recently I've realized that as I go further and further, my knee begins to ache around the 11-12km mark. After doing some research of my…
